org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel

Class XWPFParagraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFParagraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Paragraph, IBodyElement, IRunBody, ISDTContents 

    public class XWPFParagraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBodyElement, IRunBody, ISDTContents, Paragraph

    A Paragraph within a Document, Table, Header etc.

    A paragraph has a lot of styling information, but the actual text (possibly along with more styling) is held on the child XWPFRuns.

    (文档、表格、标题等中的段落。段落有很多样式信息，但实际文本（可能还有更多样式）保存在子XWPFSYS上。)

      protected IBody part

      boolean isWordWrap() 
      boolean isWordWrapped()
      This element specifies whether a consumer shall break Latin text which exceeds the text extents of a line by breaking the word across two lines (breaking on the character level) or by moving the word to the following line (breaking on the word level).(此元素指定消费者是否应通过将单词拆分成两行（在字符级别上拆分）或将单词移动到下一行（在单词级别上拆分）来拆分超过一行文本范围的拉丁文本。)

      removes a Run at the position pos in the paragraph(删除段落中位置pos处的Run)

      • getNumIlvl

        public java.math.BigInteger getNumIlvl()

      • getNumFmt

        public java.lang.String getNumFmt()

      • getNumLevelText

        public java.lang.String getNumLevelText()
        Returns the text that should be used around the paragraph level numbers.(返回应在段落级别编号周围使用的文本。)
        Returns:
        a string (e.g. "%1.") or null if the value is not found.(字符串（例如“%1.“）或如果找不到值，则为空。)

      • getNumStartOverride

        public java.math.BigInteger getNumStartOverride()
        Gets the numstartOverride for the paragraph numbering for this paragraph.(获取此段落的段落编号的numstartHandler。)
        Returns:
        returns the overridden start number or null if there is no override for this paragraph.(如果此段落没有覆盖，则返回覆盖的开始号或空。)

        public java.lang.String getFootnoteText()
        Returns the footnote text of the paragraph(返回段落的脚注文本)
        Returns:
        the footnote text or empty string if the paragraph does not have footnotes(脚注文本或空字符串（如果段落没有脚注）)

      • getAlignment

        public ParagraphAlignment getAlignment()
        Returns the paragraph alignment which shall be applied to text in this paragraph.

        If this element is not set on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then no alignment is applied to the paragraph.

        (返回应应用于本段落中的文本的段落对齐方式。如果未在给定段落上设置此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置来确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则不会对段落应用对齐方式。)
        Returns:
        the paragraph alignment of this paragraph.(本段落的段落对齐。)

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment(ParagraphAlignment align)
        Specifies the paragraph alignment which shall be applied to text in this paragraph.

        If this element is not set on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then no alignment is applied to the paragraph.

        (指定应用于本段落中文本的段落对齐方式。如果未在给定段落上设置此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置来确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则不会对段落应用对齐方式。)
        Parameters:
        align - the paragraph alignment to apply to this paragraph.(对齐-应用于此段落的段落对齐方式。)

      • getFontAlignment

        public int getFontAlignment()
        Specified by:
        getFontAlignment in interface Paragraph(界面中的getFont对齐段落)
        Returns:
        The raw alignment value, getAlignment() is suggested(建议使用原始对齐值getConnection（）)

      • setFontAlignment

        public void setFontAlignment(int align)
        Specified by:
        setFontAlignment in interface Paragraph(界面中的setFont对齐段落)

      • getVerticalAlignment

        public TextAlignment getVerticalAlignment()
        Returns the text vertical alignment which shall be applied to text in this paragraph.

        If the line height (before any added spacing) is larger than one or more characters on the line, all characters will be aligned to each other as specified by this element.

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then the vertical alignment of all characters on the line shall be automatically determined by the consumer.

        (返回文本垂直对齐方式，该对齐方式应应用于本段落中的文本。如果行高（在添加任何间距之前）大于行上的一个或多个字符，则所有字符将按照此元素的指定相互对齐。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则行上所有字符的垂直对齐方式将由消费者自动确定。)
        Returns:
        the vertical alignment of this paragraph.(本段落的垂直对齐。)

      • setVerticalAlignment

        public void setVerticalAlignment(TextAlignment valign)
        Specifies the text vertical alignment which shall be applied to text in this paragraph.

        If the line height (before any added spacing) is larger than one or more characters on the line, all characters will be aligned to each other as specified by this element.

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then the vertical alignment of all characters on the line shall be automatically determined by the consumer.

        (指定应用于此段落中文本的文本垂直对齐方式。如果行高（在添加任何间距之前）大于行上的一个或多个字符，则所有字符将按照此元素的指定相互对齐。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则行上所有字符的垂直对齐方式将由消费者自动确定。)
        Parameters:
        valign - the paragraph vertical alignment to apply to this paragraph.(valign -适用于此段落的段落垂直对齐方式。)

      • getBorderTop

        public Borders getBorderTop()
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed above a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.(指定应显示在具有相同段落边界设置的一组段落上方的边界。)
        Returns:
        paragraphBorder - the top border for the paragraph(paragraphBorder -段落的顶部边界)
        See Also:
        setBorderTop(Borders), a list of all types of borders

      • setBorderTop

        public void setBorderTop(Borders border)
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed above a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.

        To determine if any two adjoining paragraphs shall have an individual top and bottom border or a between border, the set of borders on the two adjoining paragraphs are compared. If the border information on those two paragraphs is identical for all possible paragraphs borders, then the between border is displayed. Otherwise, the final paragraph shall use its bottom border and the following paragraph shall use its top border, respectively. If this border specifies a space attribute, that value determines the space above the text (ignoring any spacing above) which should be left before this border is drawn, specified in points.

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then no between border shall be applied above identical paragraphs.

        This border can only be a line border.        (指定应显示在具有相同段落边界设置的一组段落上方的边界。为了确定任何两个相邻段落是否应该具有单独的顶部和底部边框或中间边框，比较两个相邻段落上的边框集。如果这两个段落的边框信息对于所有可能的段落边框都是相同的，则显示中间边框。否则，最后一段应使用其底部边框，下一段应使用其顶部边框。如果此边界指定了空间属性，则该值确定文本上方的空间（忽略上面的任何空间），在绘制此边界之前应该保留该空间，以点指定。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果样式层次结构中从未指定此设置，则不应在相同段落上方应用任何中间边框。该边界只能是线边界。)
        Parameters:
        border - one of the defined Border styles, see Borders(边框-已定义的边框样式之一，请参阅边框)
        See Also:
        for a list of all types of borders

      • getBorderBottom

        public Borders getBorderBottom()
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed below a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.(指定应显示在具有相同段落边界设置的一组段落下方的边界。)
        Returns:
        paragraphBorder - the bottom border for the paragraph(paragraphBorder -段落的底部边界)
        See Also:
        setBorderBottom(Borders), a list of all types of borders

      • setBorderBottom

        public void setBorderBottom(Borders border)
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed below a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.

        To determine if any two adjoining paragraphs shall have an individual top and bottom border or a between border, the set of borders on the two adjoining paragraphs are compared. If the border information on those two paragraphs is identical for all possible paragraphs borders, then the between border is displayed. Otherwise, the final paragraph shall use its bottom border and the following paragraph shall use its top border, respectively. If this border specifies a space attribute, that value determines the space after the bottom of the text (ignoring any space below) which should be left before this border is drawn, specified in points.

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then no between border shall be applied below identical paragraphs.

        This border can only be a line border.        (指定应显示在具有相同段落边界设置的一组段落下方的边界。为了确定任何两个相邻段落是否应该具有单独的顶部和底部边框或中间边框，比较两个相邻段落上的边框集。如果这两个段落的边框信息对于所有可能的段落边框都是相同的，则显示中间边框。否则，最后一段应使用其底部边框，下一段应使用其顶部边框。如果此边界指定了空间属性，则该值确定文本底部后面的空间（忽略下面的任何空间），在绘制此边界之前应该保留该空间，以点指定。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果样式层次结构中从未指定此设置，则在相同段落下方不应应用任何中间边框。该边界只能是线边界。)
        Parameters:
        border - one of the defined Border styles, see Borders(边框-已定义的边框样式之一，请参阅边框)
        See Also:
        a list of all types of borders

      • getBorderLeft

        public Borders getBorderLeft()
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed on the left side of the page around the specified paragraph.(指定应显示在页面左侧指定段落周围的边框。)
        Returns:
        ParagraphBorder - the left border for the paragraph(ParagraphBorder -段落的左边框)
        See Also:
        setBorderLeft(Borders), for a list of all possible borders

      • setBorderLeft

        public void setBorderLeft(Borders border)
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed on the left side of the page around the specified paragraph.

        To determine if any two adjoining paragraphs should have a left border which spans the full line height or not, the left border shall be drawn between the top border or between border at the top (whichever would be rendered for the current paragraph), and the bottom border or between border at the bottom (whichever would be rendered for the current paragraph).

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then no left border shall be applied.

        This border can only be a line border.        (指定应显示在页面左侧指定段落周围的边框。为了确定任何两个相邻的段落是否应具有跨越整行高度的左边框，左边框应在顶部边框或顶部边框之间（以当前段落呈现的为准）和底部边框或底部边框之间（以当前段落呈现的为准）绘制。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则不应应用左边框。该边界只能是线边界。)
        Parameters:
        border - one of the defined Border styles, see Borders(边框-已定义的边框样式之一，请参阅边框)
        See Also:
        for a list of all possible borders

      • getBorderRight

        public Borders getBorderRight()
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed on the right side of the page around the specified paragraph.(指定应显示在页面右侧指定段落周围的边框。)
        Returns:
        ParagraphBorder - the right border for the paragraph(ParagraphBorder -段落的右边框)
        See Also:
        setBorderRight(Borders), for a list of all possible borders

      • setBorderRight

        public void setBorderRight(Borders border)
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed on the right side of the page around the specified paragraph.

        To determine if any two adjoining paragraphs should have a right border which spans the full line height or not, the right border shall be drawn between the top border or between border at the top (whichever would be rendered for the current paragraph), and the bottom border or between border at the bottom (whichever would be rendered for the current paragraph).

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then no right border shall be applied.

        This border can only be a line border.        (指定应显示在页面右侧指定段落周围的边框。为了确定任何两个相邻的段落是否应有跨越整行高度的右边框，右边框应在顶部边框或顶部边框之间（以当前段落呈现的为准）和底部边框或底部边框之间（以当前段落呈现的为准）绘制。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则不应应用右边框。该边界只能是线边界。)
        Parameters:
        border - one of the defined Border styles, see Borders(边框-已定义的边框样式之一，请参阅边框)
        See Also:
        for a list of all possible borders

      • getBorderBetween

        public Borders getBorderBetween()
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed between each paragraph in a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.(指定具有相同段落边界设置的一组段落中的每个段落之间应显示的边界。)
        Returns:
        ParagraphBorder - the between border for the paragraph(ParagraphBorder -段落的中间边框)
        See Also:
        setBorderBetween(Borders), for a list of all possible borders

      • setBorderBetween

        public void setBorderBetween(Borders border)
        Specifies the border which shall be displayed between each paragraph in a set of paragraphs which have the same set of paragraph border settings.

        To determine if any two adjoining paragraphs should have a between border or an individual top and bottom border, the set of borders on the two adjoining paragraphs are compared. If the border information on those two paragraphs is identical for all possible paragraphs borders, then the between border is displayed. Otherwise, each paragraph shall use its bottom and top border, respectively. If this border specifies a space attribute, that value is ignored - this border is always located at the bottom of each paragraph with an identical following paragraph, taking into account any space after the line pitch.

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then no between border shall be applied between identical paragraphs.

        This border can only be a line border.        (指定具有相同段落边界设置的一组段落中的每个段落之间应显示的边界。为了确定任何两个相邻段落是否应该具有中间边界或单独的顶部和底部边界，将比较两个相邻段落上的一组边界。如果这两个段落的边框信息对于所有可能的段落边框都是相同的，则显示中间边框。否则，每个段落应分别使用其底部和顶部边框。如果此边界指定了一个空白属性，则该值将被忽略-此边界始终位于每个段落的底部，后面有相同的段落，并考虑到行间距后面的任何空白。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果样式层次结构中从未指定此设置，则不应在相同的段落之间应用任何中间边界。该边界只能是线边界。)
        Parameters:
        border - one of the defined Border styles, see Borders(边框-已定义的边框样式之一，请参阅边框)
        See Also:
        for a list of all possible borders

      • isPageBreak

        public boolean isPageBreak()
        Specifies that when rendering this document in a paginated view, the contents of this paragraph are rendered on the start of a new page in the document.

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then this property shall not be applied. Since the paragraph is specified to start on a new page, it begins page two even though it could have fit on page one.

        (指定在分层视图中呈现此文档时，此段落的内容将在文档新页面的开始处呈现。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则不应应用此属性。由于该段落被指定在新页面上开始，因此即使它可以放在第一页面上，它也会从第二页开始。)
        Returns:
        boolean - if page break is set(布尔值-如果设置了断点)

      • setPageBreak

        public void setPageBreak(boolean pageBreak)
        Specifies that when rendering this document in a paginated view, the contents of this paragraph are rendered on the start of a new page in the document.

        If this element is omitted on a given paragraph, its value is determined by the setting previously set at any level of the style hierarchy (i.e. that previous setting remains unchanged). If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then this property shall not be applied. Since the paragraph is specified to start on a new page, it begins page two even though it could have fit on page one.

        (指定在分层视图中呈现此文档时，此段落的内容将在文档新页面的开始处呈现。如果在给定段落上省略此元素，则其值由之前在样式层次结构的任何级别设置的设置确定（即之前的设置保持不变）。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则不应应用此属性。由于该段落被指定在新页面上开始，因此即使它可以放在第一页面上，它也会从第二页开始。)
        Parameters:
        pageBreak - - boolean value(pageBreak - -布尔值)

      • getSpacingAfter

        public int getSpacingAfter()
        Specifies the spacing that should be added after the last line in this paragraph in the document in absolute units.(以绝对单位指定应添加在文档中此段落最后一行后面的间距。)
        Returns:
        int - value representing the spacing after the paragraph(int -表示段落后间距的值)

      • setSpacingAfter

        public void setSpacingAfter(int spaces)
        Specifies the spacing that should be added after the last line in this paragraph in the document in absolute units.

        If the afterLines attribute or the afterAutoSpacing attribute is also specified, then this attribute value is ignored.

        (以绝对单位指定应添加在文档中此段落最后一行后面的间距。如果还指定了afterLines属性或afterAutoSpacing属性，则将忽略此属性值。)
        Parameters:
        spaces - a positive whole number, whose contents consist of a measurement in twentieths of a point.(空间--一个正整数，其内容由二十分之一的测量组成。)

      • getSpacingAfterLines

        public int getSpacingAfterLines()
        Specifies the spacing that should be added after the last line in this paragraph in the document in absolute units.(以绝对单位指定应添加在文档中此段落最后一行后面的间距。)
        Returns:
        int - value representing the spacing after the paragraph(int -表示段落后间距的值)
        See Also:
        setSpacingAfterLines(int)

      • setSpacingAfterLines

        public void setSpacingAfterLines(int spaces)
        Specifies the spacing that should be added after the last line in this paragraph in the document in line units. The value of this attribute is specified in one hundredths of a line.

        If the afterAutoSpacing attribute is also specified, then this attribute value is ignored. If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then its value shall be zero (if needed)

        (以行单位指定应在文档中此段落最后一行后面添加的间距。此属性的值以百分之一行指定。如果还指定了afterAutoSpacing属性，则将忽略此属性值。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则其值应为零（如果需要）)
        Parameters:
        spaces - a positive whole number, whose contents consist of a measurement in hundredths of a line(空间--一个正整数，其内容由百分之一行的测量组成)

      • getSpacingBefore

        public int getSpacingBefore()
        Specifies the spacing that should be added above the first line in this paragraph in the document in absolute units.(以绝对单位指定应添加在文档中此段落第一行上方的间距。)
        Returns:
        the spacing that should be added above the first line(应在第一行上方添加的间距)
        See Also:
        setSpacingBefore(int)

      • setSpacingBefore

        public void setSpacingBefore(int spaces)
        Specifies the spacing that should be added above the first line in this paragraph in the document in absolute units.

        If the beforeLines attribute or the beforeAutoSpacing attribute is also specified, then this attribute value is ignored.

        (以绝对单位指定应添加在文档中此段落第一行上方的间距。如果还指定了beforeLines属性或beforeAutoSpacing属性，则将忽略此属性值。)
        Parameters:
        spaces - a positive whole number, whose contents consist of a measurement in twentieths of a point.(空间--一个正整数，其内容由二十分之一的测量组成。)

      • getSpacingBeforeLines

        public int getSpacingBeforeLines()
        Specifies the spacing that should be added before the first line in this paragraph in the document in line units. The value of this attribute is specified in one hundredths of a line.(以行单位指定应在文档中此段落第一行之前添加的间距。此属性的值以百分之一行指定。)
        Returns:
        the spacing that should be added before the first line in this paragraph(本段第一行之前应该添加的间距)
        See Also:
        setSpacingBeforeLines(int)

      • setSpacingBeforeLines

        public void setSpacingBeforeLines(int spaces)
        Specifies the spacing that should be added before the first line in this paragraph in the document in line units. The value of this attribute is specified in one hundredths of a line.

        If the beforeAutoSpacing attribute is also specified, then this attribute value is ignored. If this setting is never specified in the style hierarchy, then its value shall be zero.

        (以行单位指定应在文档中此段落第一行之前添加的间距。此属性的值以百分之一行指定。如果还指定了beforeAutoSpacing属性，则将忽略此属性值。如果从未在样式层次结构中指定此设置，则其值应为零。)
        Parameters:
        spaces - a positive whole number, whose contents consist of a measurement in hundredths of a line(空间--一个正整数，其内容由百分之一行的测量组成)

      • getSpacingLineRule

        public LineSpacingRule getSpacingLineRule()
        Specifies how the spacing between lines is calculated as stored in the line attribute. If this attribute is omitted, then it shall be assumed to be of a value auto if a line attribute value is present.(指定如何计算存储在line属性中的行间距。如果省略该属性，则如果存在行属性值，则应假设其值为Auto。)
        Returns:
        rule(规则)
        See Also:
        LineSpacingRule, setSpacingLineRule(LineSpacingRule)

      • setSpacingLineRule

        public void setSpacingLineRule(LineSpacingRule rule)
        Specifies how the spacing between lines is calculated as stored in the line attribute. If this attribute is omitted, then it shall be assumed to be of a value auto if a line attribute value is present.(指定如何计算存储在line属性中的行间距。如果省略该属性，则如果存在行属性值，则应假设其值为Auto。)
        Parameters:
        rule - one of the defined rules, see LineSpacingRule(规则-已定义的规则之一，请参阅LineSpacingRule)
        See Also:
        LineSpacingRule

      • getSpacingBetween

        public double getSpacingBetween()
        Return the spacing between lines of a paragraph. The units of the return value depends on the LineSpacingRule. If AUTO, the return value is in lines, otherwise the return value is in points(返回段落的行间距。返回值的单位取决于LineSpacingRule。如果为RST，则返回值以行为单位，否则返回值以点为单位)
        Returns:
        a double specifying points or lines.(双重指定点或线。)

      • setSpacingBetween

        public void setSpacingBetween(double spacing,
                              LineSpacingRule rule)
        Sets the spacing between lines in a paragraph(设置段落中行之间的间距)
        Parameters:
        spacing - - A double specifying spacing in inches or lines. If rule is AUTO, then spacing is in lines. Otherwise spacing is in points.(间隔- -以英寸或线为单位指定间隔的双单位。如果规则为“分隔”，则间距以行为单位。否则间隔以点为单位。)
        rule - - LineSpacingRule indicating how spacing is interpreted. If AUTO, then spacing value is in lines, and the height depends on the font size. If AT_LEAST, then spacing value is in inches, and is the minimum size of the line. If the line height is taller, then the line expands to match. If EXACT, then spacing is the exact line height. If the text is taller than the line height, then it is clipped at the top.(rule - - LineSpacingRule指示如何解释间隔。如果为RST，则间距值以行为单位，高度取决于字体大小。如果是AT_LEAST，则间距值以英寸为单位，并且是线的最小尺寸。如果线高度较高，则线会扩展至匹配。如果EXACT，那么间距就是确切的线高。如果文本高于行高，则会在顶部修剪它。)

      • setSpacingBetween

        public void setSpacingBetween(double spacing)
        Sets the spacing between lines in a paragraph(设置段落中行之间的间距)
        Parameters:
        spacing - - A double specifying spacing in lines.(间距- -指定行间距的双单位。)

      • getIndentationLeft

        public int getIndentationLeft()
        Specifies the indentation which shall be placed between the left text margin for this paragraph and the left edge of that paragraph's content in a left to right paragraph, and the right text margin and the right edge of that paragraph's text in a right to left paragraph

        If this attribute is omitted, its value shall be assumed to be zero. Negative values are defined such that the text is moved past the text margin, positive values move the text inside the text margin.

        (指定应放置在从左到右的段落中该段落的左文本页边和该段落内容的左边缘之间以及从右到左的段落中该段落的右文本页边和该段落文本的右边缘之间的凹痕如果省略此属性，则应假设其值为零。定义负值，以便文本移动超过文本页边距，正值将文本移动到文本页边距内。)
        Returns:
        indentation in twips or null if indentation is not set(以缇为单位的缩进，如果未设置缩进，则为null)

      • setIndentationLeft

        public void setIndentationLeft(int indentation)
        Specifies the indentation which shall be placed between the left text margin for this paragraph and the left edge of that paragraph's content in a left to right paragraph, and the right text margin and the right edge of that paragraph's text in a right to left paragraph

        If this attribute is omitted, its value shall be assumed to be zero. Negative values are defined such that the text is moved past the text margin, positive values move the text inside the text margin.

        (指定应放置在从左到右的段落中该段落的左文本页边和该段落内容的左边缘之间以及从右到左的段落中该段落的右文本页边和该段落文本的右边缘之间的凹痕如果省略此属性，则应假设其值为零。定义负值，以便文本移动超过文本页边距，正值将文本移动到文本页边距内。)
        Parameters:
        indentation - in twips(凹痕-一小串)

      • getIndentationLeftChars

        public int getIndentationLeftChars()
        Get the indentation which is placed at the left/start of this paragraph(获取位于此段落左侧/开头的凹痕)
        Returns:
        indentation in hundredths of a character unit or -1 if indentation is not set(按字符单位的百分之一计算，或者如果未设置则为-1)

      • setIndentationLeftChars

        public void setIndentationLeftChars(int indentation)
        Specifies the indentation which shall be placed at the left/start of this paragraph

        If this attribute is omitted, its value shall be assumed to be zero. if the left/start attribute is specified, then its value is ignored, and is superseded by this value.

        (指定应放置在本段落左侧/开始的凹痕如果省略此属性，则应假设其值为零。如果指定了left/start属性，则其值将被忽略，并被此值取代。)
        Parameters:
        indentation - this value is specified in hundredths of a character unit(indentation -该值以字符单位的百分之一指定)

      • getIndentationRight

        public int getIndentationRight()
        Specifies the indentation which shall be placed between the right text margin for this paragraph and the right edge of that paragraph's content in a left to right paragraph, and the right text margin and the right edge of that paragraph's text in a right to left paragraph

        If this attribute is omitted, its value shall be assumed to be zero. Negative values are defined such that the text is moved past the text margin, positive values move the text inside the text margin.

        (指定在从左到右的段落中，应放置在此段落的右文本边距和该段落内容的右边缘之间的缩进，以及在从右到左的段落中，应放置在右文本边距和该段落文本的右边缘之间的缩进。如果省略此属性，则其值应假定为零。定义负值，以便文本移动超过文本页边距，正值将文本移动到文本页边距内。)
        Returns:
        indentation in twips or null if indentation is not set(以缇为单位的缩进，如果未设置缩进，则为null)

      • setIndentationRight

        public void setIndentationRight(int indentation)
        Specifies the indentation which shall be placed between the right text margin for this paragraph and the right edge of that paragraph's content in a left to right paragraph, and the right text margin and the right edge of that paragraph's text in a right to left paragraph

        If this attribute is omitted, its value shall be assumed to be zero. Negative values are defined such that the text is moved past the text margin, positive values move the text inside the text margin.

        (指定在从左到右的段落中，应放置在此段落的右文本边距和该段落内容的右边缘之间的缩进，以及在从右到左的段落中，应放置在右文本边距和该段落文本的右边缘之间的缩进。如果省略此属性，则其值应假定为零。定义负值，以便文本移动超过文本页边距，正值将文本移动到文本页边距内。)

        public void setIndentationRightChars(int indentation)

        Parameters:

      • getIndentationHanging

        public int getIndentationHanging()
        Specifies the indentation which shall be removed from the first line of the parent paragraph, by moving the indentation on the first line back towards the beginning of the direction of text flow. This indentation is specified relative to the paragraph indentation which is specified for all other lines in the parent paragraph. The firstLine and hanging attributes are mutually exclusive, if both are specified, then the firstLine value is ignored.(指定应从父段第一行删除的凹痕，方法是将第一行上的凹痕移回文本流动方向的起点。此凹痕是相对于为父段落中的所有其他行指定的段落凹痕而指定的。firstLine和hanging属性是相互排斥的，如果两者都指定，则忽略firstLine值。)
        Returns:
        indentation in twips or null if indentation is not set(以缇为单位的缩进，如果未设置缩进，则为null)

      • setIndentationHanging

        public void setIndentationHanging(int indentation)
        Specifies the indentation which shall be removed from the first line of the parent paragraph, by moving the indentation on the first line back towards the beginning of the direction of text flow. This indentation is specified relative to the paragraph indentation which is specified for all other lines in the parent paragraph.

        The firstLine and hanging attributes are mutually exclusive, if both are specified, then the firstLine value is ignored.

        (指定应从父段第一行删除的凹痕，方法是将第一行上的凹痕移回文本流动方向的起点。此凹痕是相对于为父段落中的所有其他行指定的段落凹痕而指定的。firstLine和hanging属性是相互排斥的，如果两者都指定，则忽略firstLine值。)
        Parameters:
        indentation - in twips(凹痕-一小串)

      • getIndentationFirstLine

        public int getIndentationFirstLine()
        Specifies the additional indentation which shall be applied to the first line of the parent paragraph. This additional indentation is specified relative to the paragraph indentation which is specified for all other lines in the parent paragraph. The firstLine and hanging attributes are mutually exclusive, if both are specified, then the firstLine value is ignored. If the firstLineChars attribute is also specified, then this value is ignored. If this attribute is omitted, then its value shall be assumed to be zero (if needed).(指定应应用于父段第一行的额外凹痕。此额外的凹痕是相对于为父段落中的所有其他行指定的段落凹痕而指定的。firstLine和hanging属性是相互排斥的，如果两者都指定，则忽略firstLine值。如果还指定了firstLineChars属性，则忽略此值。如果省略该属性，则应假设其值为零（如果需要）。)
        Returns:
        indentation in twips or null if indentation is not set(以缇为单位的缩进，如果未设置缩进，则为null)

      • setIndentationFirstLine

        public void setIndentationFirstLine(int indentation)
        Specifies the additional indentation which shall be applied to the first line of the parent paragraph. This additional indentation is specified relative to the paragraph indentation which is specified for all other lines in the parent paragraph. The firstLine and hanging attributes are mutually exclusive, if both are specified, then the firstLine value is ignored. If the firstLineChars attribute is also specified, then this value is ignored. If this attribute is omitted, then its value shall be assumed to be zero (if needed).(指定应应用于父段第一行的额外凹痕。此额外的凹痕是相对于为父段落中的所有其他行指定的段落凹痕而指定的。firstLine和hanging属性是相互排斥的，如果两者都指定，则忽略firstLine值。如果还指定了firstLineChars属性，则忽略此值。如果省略该属性，则应假设其值为零（如果需要）。)
        Parameters:
        indentation - in twips(凹痕-一小串)

      • isWordWrapped

        public boolean isWordWrapped()
        This element specifies whether a consumer shall break Latin text which exceeds the text extents of a line by breaking the word across two lines (breaking on the character level) or by moving the word to the following line (breaking on the word level).(此元素指定消费者是否应通过将单词拆分成两行（在字符级别上拆分）或将单词移动到下一行（在单词级别上拆分）来拆分超过一行文本范围的拉丁文本。)
        Specified by:
        isWordWrapped in interface Paragraph(isWordWrapped in interface段落)
        Returns:
        boolean(布尔)

      • setWordWrapped

        public void setWordWrapped(boolean wrap)
        This element specifies whether a consumer shall break Latin text which exceeds the text extents of a line by breaking the word across two lines (breaking on the character level) or by moving the word to the following line (breaking on the word level).(此元素指定消费者是否应通过将单词拆分成两行（在字符级别上拆分）或将单词移动到下一行（在单词级别上拆分）来拆分超过一行文本范围的拉丁文本。)
        Specified by:
        setWordWrapped in interface Paragraph(setWordWrapped在界面中段落)
        Parameters:
        wrap - - boolean(wrap - -布尔)

      • searchText

        public TextSegment searchText(java.lang.String searched,
                              PositionInParagraph startPos)
        this methods parse the paragraph and search for the string searched. If it finds the string, it will return true and the position of the String will be saved in the parameter startPos.(该方法解析段落并搜索搜索的字符串。如果它找到字符串，它将返回true，并且字符串的位置将保存在参数startPos中。)
        Parameters:

      • addFootnoteReference

        public void addFootnoteReference(XWPFAbstractFootnoteEndnote footnote)
        Add a new run with a reference to the specified footnote. The footnote reference run will have the style name "FootnoteReference".(添加引用指定脚注的新运行。脚注引用运行将具有样式名称“FootnoteReference”。)
        Parameters:
        footnote - Footnote to which to add a reference.(脚注-要添加引用的脚注。)
        Since:
        4.0.0
